location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Rough Sketch of Operations in the Vicinity of BUSHIRE from the 3rd. to the 10th. Feby. 1857.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 216 x 216mm, on sheet 244 x 370mm

mods.abstract: The map shows a region to the north and east of Bushire in south-western Persia, indicating the positions of British and Persian military camps, and routes followed by British and Persian troops. The map also indicates hydrology, settlements and roads, and gives some indication of cultivation and relief.The map is Plate 3 in 'Persian Gulf and Gulf of Oman' (Naval Intelligence Department No. 694), 1903, and is 'Reproduced from "Outrams Persian Campaign 1857"'.A printing statement reads, 'Weller & Graham, Ltd. Litho, London.'.
